title: White appliances, Smart home package, 10 ft ceilings
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'UNION PLACE: INVITING APARTMENTS IN FRANKLIN, MA', 'Union Place is an inviting, pet-friendly apartment community in Franklin, MA, ideally located between Boston, MA and Providence, RI.', 'We offer 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom apartment homes for rent featuring multiple finish packages.', 'Select interior finishes include stainless steel appliances, wood plank flooring, and granite countertops.', 'Plus, all units include in-home washers and dryers and ample natural light.', 'Outside your home, enjoy our heated swimming pool, full-body fitness center, fully-enclosed dog park, and outdoor kitchen and grilling stations.', 'Our commuter-friendly location features proximity to the MBTA commuter rail, I-495, Route 1, and I-95.', 'Located on Independence Way, we are close to historic downtown Franklin, as well as nearby grocers, shops, and eateries.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Call Now:', '(508) 466-6552 x 10', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1031 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Bay window', '- Oak cabinets', '- White appliances', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Three unique finish packages', '- 10 ft ceilings', '- Breakfast bar', '- Washer and dryer', '- Wood plank flooring', '- Tile flooring in kitchen and bathroom', '- Additional bathroom storage', '- Wood blinds', '- Upgraded cabinetry hardware', '* Apartment amenities not available in every home.', 'Community amenities may require an additional fee.', 'Community Amenities', '- Washer and dryer', '- Furnished apartments available', '- Short term leases available', '- Oak cabinets', '- Wood blinds', '- Trails on-site', '- Heated swimming pool', '- Pet friendly', '- Fitness center', '- Bay window', '- Deposit free with Rhino', '- Controlled access building', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- On-site storage', '- 10 ft ceilings', '- Playground', '- Dog park', '- Garage parking', '- Outdoor kitchen with gas grills', '- package lockers', '- Wood plank flooring', '- Patio / balcony', '- White appliances', '- Elevator', '- Moving services with Move Matcher', '- Smart home package', '- Upgraded cabinetry hardware', '- Business center', '- Gas grills', '- Tile in kitchen and bath', '- 3 finish packages', '- Build credit score with RentTrack', '- Breakfast bar', '- Additional bathroom storage', '- Resident app', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday: 10:30AM-4:30PM', 'Union Place', '10 Independence Way, Franklin, MA, 02038', 'gEYYA6rPC']
